tasks/system/PropertyPromptTask.php 1

Type Line Description
PropertyPromptTask 38 This class is very slightly simpler than the InputTask, but lacks the ability to use a non-console input handler. You should, therefore, use InputTask. This class can serve as a reference, but will be removed in the future.
